channel.title: KingPk Online
channel.description:
[size=8pt][i]I am the owner therefore I am the only one allowed to post about this server. The other topic which is labeled "kingpk server" was not created by me but was the reason I brought the server back. I am simply going to manage it and make sure it stays online when possible. I have no plans for MYSELF to develop it further then what we all played before(others feel free to help in and join the team). I will be looking for staff to manage the actual in game and the forums for me.[/i][/size] Same classic F2P High xp rate pking server you all knew and loved. Has been online for about 6 hours. We already saw a peak of 17 players online within the first 4 being up without any adverts here. [img]http://upit.cc/i/4867eca5.png[/img] As always check out the actual forums ( in my sig) for the latest updates as well as updated commands etc. [size=14pt][b]This is the advertisment I used when i very first released KingPK. Things have changed from it but I figured since its all in one place might as well make it easy and re post with this thread[/b][/size]
ONLY RSC F2P PKING AT ITS FINEST [b][u][LATEST UPDATE] 12/23/08 100+ ONLINE PKING.. [url=http://imageshack.us/][img]http://img360.imageshack.us/img360/4784/102playerstd9.png[/img][/url] we got 85+ online active during the day had over 191 registered users first day!! now well over 5400+ Registered players! and growing. I brought back OLD OLD piru when it was f2p with support and creds to lefty with commands like [SIZE="7"] CHECK THE VIDS OUT![/SIZE][/u][/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_XoiAJcvNaY]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_XoiAJcvNaY[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pIP15FP8Sow]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pIP15FP8Sow[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Ei3BWXVOro]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Ei3BWXVOro[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kQH7Nnw_fcg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kQH7Nnw_fcg[/url] [b][u]New pk level system!! You gain xp pking as u would training! and you trade em in for rares!![/u][/b] Okay first and foremost wtf is KingPK? Well kingPK is a free to play runescape classic pking server. KingPK is one of the most pking based servers. why? I have pk level system added. which is not a pk points or anything but rather a actually skill like attack , defence , magic etc... you gain xp as you would fighting mobs for killing other players! [pking]. Also you are able to trade your hard earned pk levels in for rares. Also most of the npcs and other skills are based all in the wild. Wait before i go further yes once again these server is F2P To get started I offer any new names [ip] a r2h for 80k to start out. So if your new and trying it out let me know in game {Eric} To get some money collect coins from men sell s2hs to 2h shop in edge? Sell free swordies to lowe for about 3k a trip tons of easy ways.. Max stat is [u][b][99].[/b][/u] There is a "event" staff in play that are always hosting events such as wars mazes races anything you name it. [u][b]Few commands [/b][/u] ::stuck :: dm - death match area ::dmover- lets u leave ::dragons- sends u to lvl 29? wild where dragons are ::say - Global chat command to send everyone on server a message. ::edge - can be used while in wild if you stand still for 15 seconds. ::tired - gets u 100 fatigue ::castle takes u to castle ::runerox take u to the rune rockz there is now a 45 second delay on wild commands.. meaning if u just used a command u gotta wait 45 seconds.. still normal wait time 10 - 15 seconds to use them just a delay to stop people from coming right back ( u can re log if u wish but.. wont by pass command) [u][b]NPC's[/b][/u] Chickens - Edge Men - Edge, and in Wild Guards- Edge and in Wild Skeletons - under castle lvl 48 hobs- above castle in old bandant place red spiders ::runeroxs old rune rocks from real rsc Zombies- Edge Zombies- under ::dragons old zombie place in wild from rsc Hobgoblins- Across bridge in edge Giants- Near edge Axes- lvl 43 wild. go to ::Dragons walk north until about level 42 then west. Baby Blue dragons- Wild and way over on other side of moutain where Black knights fortress was Fire Giants- Directly North from ::dragons about lvl 35 wild then east some. Lesser demons- Old lvl 13 prayer hut above varrock wild Greater demons- Same as above, Old prayer hut lvl 13 wild Red, Blue, and King Black dragons :: dragons. ( in wild be aware) Soldiers- Edge dungeon Black Knights- Edge dungeon Ice Spiders - Edge dungeon Ice Giant - Edge dungeon Guard Dog- Behind edge bank by ladder to dungeon [b][u][Update][/u][/b] PURE PK ARENA. New npc in edge which will take you to your pure pk arena! U have to be 10-1 def in order to get in! You dont gain def xp in there you cant be ranged from the outside and u cant mage inside also will be full with swordies if u werent already ::tired now gives u 100 fatigue ::skull works now Ac bug is fully fixed now. MasterFisherman now fills ur invo with food instead of people overloading him.. Adverts are added in game to help new people. Also thing sorta like ****** " Eric just raped bob" server message when someone pks someone. ( will help to know if someone is farming pk levels) You cant log out in wild now unless you stand still for 10 seconds.. [u][b][update]MINING AND SMITHING IS NOW IN!![/b][/u] First you ask why skillz on a pking server? Well community wanted something new so i did so. But the new skill i added i made all based outta the wild. Meaning Yes you guessed it more PKING.. Rocks for mining are [b]ALL[/b] located in wild.. furnace and anvil located behind old edge bank.. Most rocks are based same place as rsc like coal is under castle, rune roxs are where they where.. and then rocks are spread around pking areas. like old zombie place in wild from rsc. [forums update logs for more detailz] New rules as well i have re did my staff and no staff member can ban ANYONE for anything other then autoing or abusing the system. No mod is allowed in the wild. Mods as well can not PK on mod accounts... [b]I updated Literally daily.. Anything anyone suggest and some users agree on it i Add. From xml editing more monsters npcs objects.. to java'ing whatever it may be. So if you are looking for a rsc pking server but havent found one with all stuff in it you want. This is the one. If i dont have it already in. Well suggest it and ill do it.[/b] ::edge now works like before! Was a week into the server [url=http://imageshack.us/][img]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/8080/50onlinexz3az6.jpg[/img][/url] Stat reduce guy in case you screw up [url=http://imageshack.us/][img]http://img117.imageshack.us/img117/563/5o9ow6tt1.png[/img][/url] Pk level system [url=http://imageshack.us/][img]http://img150.imageshack.us/img150/2169/pkingcv9um4.png[/img][/url] One current mini event we do along with alot others [url=http://imageshack.us/][img]http://img150.imageshack.us/img150/2020/mazeox0vd5.png[/img][/url] So what are you waiting for? Come check us out! Just sign up via ur profile when u reg on forums and check us out! also more news and events on forums! Come check us out!! and remember this server is just now growing from ground level and already has been a big hit!! So if ur tired of bullshit hitting 40s or max stats being redic! come check us out! [url=http://imageshack.us/][img]http://img368.imageshack.us/img368/5215/kingpkdv3.png[/img][/url] a little free for all when we got 30 online winner got a mask plz0r? [url=http://imageshack.us/][img]http://img388.imageshack.us/img388/3848/wartv1.png[/img][/url] MAZE EVENT I DO FOR SANTA HATS AND PHATS.. [url=http://imageshack.us/][img]http://img383.imageshack.us/img383/3154/maze2oh8.png[/img][/url] for client.. Latest client found on forums!!
↓↓↓

item.title: KingPk Online
item.dc:creator: @Tr0llmuch Tr0llmuch
item.description:
@Tr0llmuch wrote:

We just hit a downtime in being online for 27 days for 24/7 without zero downtime.

We will be down for about 2 days in order to what will hopefully be the final wait for the updates the server needed.

Thanks
Eric

Read full topic

item.title: KingPk Online
item.dc:creator: @Tr0llmuch Tr0llmuch
item.description:
@Tr0llmuch wrote:

[quote=“inspectah, post:37, topic:527664”][quote author=JUMPHIM link=topic=646416.msg4357459#msg4357459 date=1377982011]
so is this server over are what?
[/quote]

It never really got started tbh[/quote]

We had 46 online max within the first 72 hours of being online. The server itself has still remained online for 24/7 since being re launched.

However we are over hauling to a new source. There is no “down time” to the server however many have chosen to not play during this over haul.

Once we are on the new source we expect the same massive amount of players online and support as we had on re launch!

Read full topic
